Our conversation with these souls should be of a spiritual, encouraging character. The Lord marks the conflicts of every weak, doubting, struggling one, and He will help all who call upon Him. They will see 
                                                                           318
heaven open before them, and angels of God descending and ascending the ladder of shining brightness which they are trying to climb.--Testimonies, vol. 6, pp. 92, 93. (1900)
